comment: One of the nicest and most caring professors I have ever had. She is so sweet and you can tell she's really passionate about teaching. I would take her for every class if I could.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Dr. B is the sweetest professor I've had so far. She was very nice and relaxed teacher which was perfect for the first EDUC class. Her lessons are discussion based and she gives two weeks for every assignment. I highly recommend her.

Dr. Blaver was amazing. I'm so glad I had her as a professor. She's very passionate about education. She wants everyone to do well and is there to help. She even brought us food every class which was great! If I could take her class again, I totally would.

The course was boring and I felt was a waste of time. Dr. Blaver was helpful and willing to accommodate you with  the assignments  depending on your circumstances. She did not respond to emails in a reasonable time frame. The assignments were fairly easy, but there were times the directions were vague.
